scripts.dev: npm run open && if exist %cd%/node_modules ( next dev -p 4000 ) else ( yarn run yarndev )
scripts.build: if exist %cd%/node_modules ( next build ) else ( yarn run yarnbuild )
scripts.start: npm run open && if exist %cd%/node_modules ( next start -p 4000 ) else ( yarn run yarnstart )
scripts.export: if exist %cd%/node_modules ( next export ) else ( yarn run yarnexport )
scripts.yarn2: npm install -g yarn && yarn set version berry && yarn install && yarn add react-is
